name: wepy-plugin-usingcomponents
description: wepy-plugin-usingcomponents auto require wx min app usingcomponents

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && babel index.js --out-file lib/index.js && git add . && git commit -am 'build...'
scripts.prelease: npm run build && npm version prerelease && git push --tags --force && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm run build && npm version major && git push --tags && git push && npm publish

author: wangjianliang
